public class Link
extends Component

Link component is a component to represent links

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

Link

public Link(java.lang.String text,
            java.lang.String url)
Creates an instance of menu using given text and url. Url can be either a fully qualifed Tierlet name or HTML Url.

Link

public Link(java.lang.String text,
            java.lang.String url,
            java.util.Properties props)
Creates an instance of menu using given text, URL and URL parameters. Url can be either a fully qualifed Tierlet name or HTML URL.

Link

public Link(java.lang.String text,
            java.lang.String url,
            java.lang.String parameterName,
            java.lang.String parameterValue)
Creates an instance of menu using given text and url and asingle parameter. Url can be either a fully qualifed Tierlet name or HTML Url. This is a convenience contructor for cases when there is only one parameter.
